thread.title: Travel Diary: Designer Kym Ellery Sails Through Greece and Turkey
thread.title_full: Travel Diary: Designer Kym Ellery Sails Through Greece and Turkey - Vogue

author: Brooke Bobb
title: Travel Diary: Designer Kym Ellery Sails Through Greece and Turkey
text: When Kym Ellery isn’t busy tailoring a flared-sleeve dress or a structured wool blazer for her line, Ellery, the talented Australian designer is happiest at sea. For a week in August, she set sail on the waters of Turkey and Greece with 24 friends. “The captain plotted where we would go and he’d set sail before sunrise each morning,” Ellery says. “We would wake to find ourselves in a new bay and there were often no other boats in sight.” Here, she shares her personal holiday photos from the cruise that she calls “magical.”
